container_type.name: container_type
container_type.documentation: The type of the container. This converts to the `_root_type_` in `BMM_GENERIC_TYPE`. Persisted attribute.

type_def.name: type_def
type_def.documentation: Type definition of `_type_`, if not a simple String type reference. Persisted attribute.

type.name: type
type.documentation: The target type; this converts to the first parameter in `_generic_parameters_` in `BMM_GENERIC_TYPE`. Persisted attribute.

type_ref.name: type_ref
type_ref.documentation: The target type; this converts to the first parameter in `_generic_parameters_` in `BMM_GENERIC_TYPE`. Persisted attribute.
